Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.persistency.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Object
Represents an enemy in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(int x, int y, Enemy.Direction direction, Instant lastDirectionChange, Chap chap)
      Constructs an enemy with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The initial x-coordinate.
      y - The initial y-coordinate.
      direction - The initial movement direction.
      lastDirectionChange - The instant when the direction was last changed.
      chap - The player that the enemy is following.

      public Enemy move(Tile[][] grid)
      Moves the enemy on the game grid based on its current state.
      Parameters:
      grid - The game grid.
      Returns:
      A new enemy object after the movement.
